snippet: The researchers conducted magnetic resonance imaging analysis of 45 Canadian university players before, during and after the 2011-12 season.
lead_paragraph: The researchers conducted magnetic resonance imaging analysis of 45 Canadian university players before, during and after the 2011-12 season.

headline.main: Study Finds Changes in Brains of Hockey Players Who Had Concussions
headline.print_headline: Study Finds Changes in Brains of Hockey Players Who Had Concussions
